noun.description: Chiefly with capital initial. A supporter or advocate of territorialism. Compare "Zionist". Now historical.

adjective.description: Of, relating to, or characterized by territorialism.
Specifically. Chiefly with capital initial. Of or relating to Territorialism as a Jewish movement or doctrine. See territorialism. Now historical.

origin: Mid 19th century (in an earlier sense). From territorial + -ist.
